title: Jungle, Top and Mid (Plat-Diamond) looking for ORGANISATION
body:
Me (Jungle), Akiae (Mid) and Deazura (Top) are looking for a 5v5 Organisation or team. We are german so we'd like to join a german team/organisation. We have good teamplay and we are playing League since season 1. 

{{item:3902}}

replies.body:
hey, mein kumpel (supp/P3) und ich (adc/p4) suchen auch nach nem team. KÃ¶nnten uns ja zusammentun und mal gucken, ob alles passt ;) 
adde mich wenn Interesse besteht
